Description:
IN/SPD140222/01-312271569
You have failed to provide the supervision necessary to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the 
health and safety of the timber frame factory employees in that; the roles of supervisors in relation to health and safety matters have not been clearly defined and, procedures have not been established to supervise standards in relation to key health and safety hazards (such as machinery guarding and exposure to wood dust)

IN/SPD140222/02-312271779
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to wood dust, which is a substance 
hazardous to health is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled in that; you have failed to establish appropriate work processes and provide suitable work equipment for cleaning activities and, as a consequence, dry sweeping is being used to clear wood dust in the workshop.

IN/SPD140222/03-312271834
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to wood dust, which is a substance 
hazardous to health is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled in that; the local exhaust ventilation system installed at the DeWalt DW721KN manual crosscut saw is failing to adequately control the wood dust released when this saw is used.
